meanings.sent1: The horned cow grazed peacefully in the meadow.
meanings.sent2: The majestic bull with horned head led the herd.
meanings.sent3: The horned helmet made the knight look like a mythical creature.
meanings.sent4: The horned moon rose slowly over the horizon.
meanings.sent5: The horned owl hooted softly in the night.

meanings.sent1: The horned Viking helmet was a symbol of strength.
meanings.sent2: The costume designer created a horned headdress for the play.
meanings.sent3: The horned crown made the king look both regal and comical.
meanings.sent4: The horned car was a unique sight on the road.
meanings.sent5: The horned statue stood proudly in the town square.

meanings.definition: Having a hornlike projection or structure
meanings.sent1: The horned beetle crawled slowly across the leaf.
meanings.sent2: The horned lizard camouflaged itself among the rocks.
meanings.sent3: The horned handle of the sword added a fierce touch to the weapon.
meanings.sent4: The horned mountain peak stood tall against the sky.
meanings.sent5: The horned flower petals added a unique beauty to the garden.
